AQUA_AFFINITY.description: Increases the speed at which a player may mine underwater

CHANNELING.description:
Strikes lightning when a mob is hit with a trident if conditions are
 stormy

DEPTH_STRIDER.description: Increases walking speed while in water

EFFICIENCY.description: Increases the rate at which you mine/dig

FIRE_ASPECT.description: When attacking a target, has a chance to set them on fire

FLAME.description: Sets entities on fire when hit by arrows shot from a bow

FORTUNE.description: Provides a chance of gaining extra loot when destroying blocks

FROST_WALKER.description: Freezes any still water adjacent to ice / frost which player is walking on

IMPALING.description: Deals more damage to mobs that live in the ocean

INFINITY.description: Provides infinite arrows when shooting a bow

KNOCKBACK.description: All damage to other targets will knock them back when hit

LOOTING.description: Provides a chance of gaining extra loot when killing monsters

LOYALTY.description: Causes a thrown trident to return to the player who threw it

LUCK_OF_THE_SEA.description: Decreases odds of catching worthless junk

LURE.description: Increases rate of fish biting your hook

MENDING.description: Allows mending the item using experience orbs

POWER.description: Provides extra damage when shooting arrows from bows

PUNCH.description: Provides a knockback when an entity is hit by an arrow from a bow

RESPIRATION.description: Decreases the rate of air loss whilst underwater

RIPTIDE.description: When it is rainy, launches the player in the direction their trident is thrown

SILK_TOUCH.description:
Allows blocks to drop themselves instead of fragments (for example,
 stone instead of cobblestone)

SWEEPING_EDGE.description: Increases damage against targets when using a sweep attack

UNBREAKING.description: Decreases the rate at which a tool looses durability

WIND_BURST.description: Emits wind burst upon hitting enemy
